Dead by Daylight is likely the best asymmetrical multiplayer game out there. Being a killer feels great when you are catching everyone and throwing them on hooks. Being a survivor feels great when you are able to avoid being hit and are being a major thorn in the killer's side. But the major factor to enjoying the game though comes from commitment and time. This is not a game to casually play an occasional Saturday afternoon. So if you do not want to invest a large amount of time learning about the game? I would simply avoid it. Likely you will play several games and just become frustrated, as there is little direction on how to improve.

The whole game is boiled down to the survivors repairing generators to open one of two doors to live, and avoiding the killer while you do it. That's it. In your early games, you might never see an inexperienced killer because they don't even know how to find anyone. An inexperienced survivor will likely be hiding in a corner and panic once they are seen, and get killed immediately. Then as soon as you face competent opponents your fun crashes into a brick wall. "How do they keep avoiding me?" "Why are they always able to find me right away when I'm in a corner of the map?" "X perk is so overpowered, I hate it." All things you will say in these growing pains.

Thankfully there are tons of resources to help you along. Many streamers like OhTofu or Otzdarva are incredible at giving you information to learn. Ways to improve. There are many guides out there for fundamentals as well as character specifics. And the more time you invest the more you can enjoy Dead by Daylight.

I am a salty person. I hate getting bullied while I'm a killer by extremely good survivors. I hate going into a lobby with a face camping killer, or someone that has mastered them. It's hard to start out with no perks to help you, or someone that can help push you forward to learning more. Just do what you can each game and then blame it on the terrible matchmaking. If anything enjoy some of the great content creators like I mentioned. Watch how they play. Over time you will catch on for when you do decide to jump into a lobby.

~Lover of Traps, a Trapper enthusiast.

pretty good as far as asymmetrical horror goes, but that formula can grow old.  at times the game is really addicting and fun, but there are others that the game seems frustratingly unbalanced (whether because of bad matchmaking or a steep rank wall).  I've put in hundreds of hours on the Ps4 and steam and I always plan to come back to it, because it satisfies a certain itch.  It's pretty impressive how long it's received continued updates and support, and in general I would say that these updates make the game better (in general...)

One I don't like are the prices on the cosmetics---they're a bit outrageous, with some totaling $14 or so.  I mean, they're all very cool and all, but that's enough money for a decent new game.

作为一个黎明杀机的新手我觉得这个版本的更新不是很令人满意，原因如下：
一、新版本的UI界面让人耳目一新，但却给人一种中看不中用的感觉，除了能看到队友几挂之外，其他的我觉得还是之前的比较好，简单明了（个人感觉）
二、人物姿势和视角的改动，对于人皇们可能来说贴膜，博弈方面有所提升，对于我这种萌新来说并不友好，打枪手这些有远程技能的屠夫真心不好打
三、这版本屠夫的刀气真的很离谱，和人类视野所观察到的距离能差一个身位，以前打不到人类的距离，这个版本可能就可以打到了，几波快翻吃刀人被打傻了。
四、这版本的QTE，可能是我技术的原因，死活打不到完美的那块QTE区域，有些离谱。
希望制作组能尽快优化一下，真的有点劝退新人
什么时候把人物动作跟屠夫的魔法刀气改了再好评，真的晦气。PTGJSF

游戏很早之前买了但摆在一直桌面上没碰，其实我也没玩儿多久，还是来说一下测评吧。我自己是在大更新后才真正意义上开始杀鸡的，看了一圈评论，似乎大家都在诟病动作僵直和刀气判定，我由于无法和之前版本再进行对比了，所以我也不是很清楚之前玩家的游玩体验——或许真的会比现在好吧。但是我想说，新版本其实也没有那么多差评那么恐怖，还是可以快乐，我自己也觉得无论是人还是屠夫在低端局（仅限低端局啊，我太菜了，也不知道高端局情况，高端局应该更在意下板时机和延迟判定，但低端局应该不会有太多人会在意那些人皇细节吧，勿喷）还是可以愉快的游玩的。总之，对于各位萌新宝宝=。=，我还是比较推荐玩玩，杀鸡这样一个老牌了，能撑这么多年还是有它的道理滴，可能这次更新伤了老玩家的心，但是新来的也可来这比较友好的人间地狱练练手，还有，不要再云了了了了了了！

I've played this game a lot longer than i should have. I know that this is a very good game to play with your friends. The community is mostly nice, the gameplay is very entertaining.

The game play loop is very simple: turn on generators, escape. However, the number of killers that all play differently help keep the game somewhat fresh as you go. I would certainly say it has been worth the cost of admission.
ta bn

I played one game after 5 months as the spirit, I couldn’t wait to see the new update but later I figured it was a total MISTAKE! I have about 1000hrs in this game (with other accts) and never have I EVER feel so disappointed. First the UI is trash, you barely have time to see how many people are injured and how many charge is left for phase at the same time, took me tons of time just checking the status. There’s also bugs EVERYWHERE. Survivor models outside of lockers, cancelled grabbing animation which had one of the arm always floating (if y’all know what I mean by that), etc. I have seen enough bugs in one game than ever. I read comments from others and I saw that UI isn’t the only problem, there’s more issues regarding the gameplay and so. I understand and appreciate the hard works by the devs, but if this is what they do to promote their mobile game or whatsoever, then I would recommend people to give up hope to this game. It’s rather heartbreaking than being disappointed. : (

In the game's current state I would not recommend buying it; hitboxes are broken, UI is confusing, Movement has lost all flow and animations were changed for no reason. BHVR put out a PTB and had 95% negative reviews, then decided to put the update on live servers. It's almost like they want veteran and experienced players to leave the game. 
They take feedback from players with 20 hours, instead of ones with thousands who know what is right to improve the player experience.
But with that said, before the 4.5.0 mid-chapter update DBD was fun, hard to master but rewarding when you learnt the mechanics of the game. If this update is fixed or reverted, I would 110% recommend this game to anyone, as it can provide thousands of hours of entertainment for a small price. BHVR please fix your game.

Do I recommend this game for custom games with friends? YES! It is extremely fun to play with friends especially with the perfect combo of messing around and playing seriously.

Do I recommend this game for online? Ehh. It can be really frustrating with the amount of bullshit this game can throw at you. If you have a good friend group to play it with, go for it! The killers can be pretty damn unbalanced and frustrating. Online is honestly a hit or miss, depends on how you handle anger lol.

le jeu etait vraiment fun avant tu etait capable de looper passer les fenetres sans trop te prendre des hits de merde, mais depuis la nouvelle MAJ, en survivant il n'y a plus moyen de survive (les hit qui ne devrait pas etre valider(palette baisser largement en avance, hit fenetre quand tu la largement passer) tu mange le hit, il n'y a plus moyen de s'amuser.
la seule chose a faire en survivant reparer les generateur, aucun moyen de looper le tueur sans prendre un hit de merde, je dit meme avec FRISSON ET RESISTANCE. Vraiment decevant comme MAJ, le jeu est devenu un jeu pour les tueurs, resterais juste une chose a faire sa serai de mettre les survivant en IA.

Oyunu almak isteyenlere öneririm. Oyunu iki türlü oynayabilirsiniz katil olarak ya da kurban olarak. Aldığımdan beri günde 5-6 saat arkadaşlarımla oynuyorum. Oyunu oynayabilecek 4 kişilik bir arkadaş tayfanız varsa almalısınız, şahsen tek oynadığımda oyun pek sarmıyor. Fakat katil fps oynamak isterseniz tekte sevebilirsiniz. Önceden uyarayım oyunda katillerin hitbox'ına bazen kanser olabilirsiniz
